verses.plain: O God, why hast thou cast us off for ever? why doth thine anger smoke against the sheep of thy pasture?

tokens.t: O God, why hast thou cast
off for ever?
doth thine anger smoke against the sheep of thy pasture?

verses.plain: Remember thy congregation, which thou hast purchased of old; the rod of thine inheritance, which thou hast redeemed; this mount Zion, wherein thou hast dwelt.

tokens.t: Remember thy congregation,
thou hast purchased of old; the rod of thine inheritance,
thou hast redeemed; this mount Zion, wherein thou hast dwelt.

verses.plain: Lift up thy feet unto the perpetual desolations; even all that the enemy hath done wickedly in the sanctuary.

tokens.t: Lift up thy feet unto the perpetual desolations;
all
the enemy hath done wickedly in the sanctuary.

verses.plain: Thine enemies roar in the midst of thy congregations; they set up their ensigns for signs.

tokens.t: Thine enemies roar in the midst of thy congregations; they set up their ensigns
signs.

verses.plain: A man was famous according as he had lifted up axes upon the thick trees.

tokens.t: was famous according as he had lifted up axes upon the thick trees.

verses.plain: But now they break down the carved work thereof at once with axes and hammers.

tokens.t: But now they break down the carved work thereof at once with axes and hammers.

verses.plain: They have cast fire into thy sanctuary, they have defiled by casting down the dwelling place of thy name to the ground.

tokens.t: They have cast fire into thy sanctuary, they have defiled
the dwelling place of thy name to the ground.

verses.plain: They said in their hearts, Let us destroy them together: they have burned up all the synagogues of God in the land.

tokens.t: They said in their hearts, Let us destroy them together: they have burned up all the synagogues of God in the land.

verses.plain: We see not our signs: there is no more any prophet: neither is there among us any that knoweth how long.

tokens.t: We see not our signs:
no more any prophet: neither
among us any that knoweth how long.

verses.plain: O God, how long shall the adversary reproach? shall the enemy blaspheme thy name for ever?

tokens.t: O God, how long shall the adversary reproach? shall the enemy blaspheme thy name for ever?

verses.plain: Why withdrawest thou thy hand, even thy right hand? pluck it out of thy bosom.

tokens.t: Why withdrawest thou thy hand, even thy right hand? pluck
out of thy bosom.

verses.plain: For God is my King of old, working salvation in the midst of the earth.

tokens.t: For God
my King of old, working salvation in the midst of the earth.

verses.plain: Thou didst divide the sea by thy strength: thou brakest the heads of the dragons in the waters.

tokens.t: Thou didst divide the sea by thy strength: thou brakest the heads of the dragons in the waters.

verses.plain: Thou brakest the heads of leviathan in pieces, and gavest him to be meat to the people inhabiting the wilderness.

tokens.t: Thou brakest the heads of leviathan in pieces,
gavest him
meat to the people inhabiting the wilderness.

verses.plain: Thou didst cleave the fountain and the flood: thou driedst up mighty rivers.

tokens.t: Thou didst cleave the fountain and the flood: thou driedst up mighty rivers.

verses.plain: The day is thine, the night also is thine: thou hast prepared the light and the sun.

tokens.t: The day
thine, the night also
thine: thou hast prepared the light and the sun.

verses.plain: Thou hast set all the borders of the earth: thou hast made summer and winter.

tokens.t: Thou hast set all the borders of the earth: thou hast made summer and winter.

verses.plain: Remember this, that the enemy hath reproached, O LORD, and that the foolish people have blasphemed thy name.

tokens.t: Remember this,
the enemy hath reproached, O
, and
the foolish people have blasphemed thy name.

verses.plain: O deliver not the soul of thy turtledove unto the multitude of the wicked: forget not the congregation of thy poor for ever.

tokens.t: O deliver not the soul of thy turtledove unto the multitude
forget not the congregation of thy poor for ever.

verses.plain: Have respect unto the covenant: for the dark places of the earth are full of the habitations of cruelty.

tokens.t: Have respect unto the covenant: for the dark places of the earth are full of the habitations of cruelty.

verses.plain: O let not the oppressed return ashamed: let the poor and needy praise thy name.

tokens.t: O let not the oppressed return ashamed: let the poor and needy praise thy name.

verses.plain: Arise, O God, plead thine own cause: remember how the foolish man reproacheth thee daily.

tokens.t: Arise, O God, plead thine own cause: remember how the foolish man reproacheth thee daily.

verses.plain: Forget not the voice of thine enemies: the tumult of those that rise up against thee increaseth continually.

tokens.t: Forget not the voice of thine enemies: the tumult of those that rise up against thee increaseth continually.

footnotes.text: Maschil…: or, A Psalm for Asaph to give instruction
They have cast…: Heb. They have sent thy sanctuary unto the fire
